getThisReturnPreservedMask - Returns a call preserved mask specific to the case that &#39;returned&#39; is on an i32 first argument if the calling convention is one that can (partially) model this attribute with a preserved mask (i.e.

it is a calling convention that uses the same register for the first i32 argument and an i32 return value)

## Protected Member Attributes

### BasePtr {#ad7d3d20d0e64bd376f5dd31b1ffc716f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::ARMBaseRegisterInfo::BasePtr = ARM::R6"
  labels = {["protected"]}>
BasePtr - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm">ARM</a> physical register used as a base ptr in complex stack frames.

I.e., when we need a 3rd base, not just SP and FP, due to variable size stack objects.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseregisterinfo-h/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseregisterinfo-h">ARMBaseRegisterInfo.h</a>.
